ns0:entry.ns0:title: Alexofp/BDCC
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/Alexofp/BDCC
Language: gdscript
Text based game about being a prisoner in a space prison with a lot of adult themes. Working title is Broken Dreams Correctional Center or BDCC for short. Test the latest version here: (could be unstable)

ns0:entry.ns0:title: HungryProton/scatter
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/HungryProton/scatter
Language: gdscript
Godot engine addon to randomly fill an area with props or other scenes

ns0:entry.ns0:title: JHDev2006/Super-Mario-Bros.-Remastered-Public
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/JHDev2006/Super-Mario-Bros.-Remastered-Public
Language: gdscript
A Remake / Celebration of the original 'Super Mario Bros.' games. Features new levels, custom modes, new characters, alongside a full level editor / custom level system!

ns0:entry.ns0:title: MewPurPur/GodSVG
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/MewPurPur/GodSVG
Language: gdscript
A vector graphics application for structured SVG editing, available on all major desktop platforms and on web. Currently in late alpha.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: Open-Industry-Project/Open-Industry-Project
ns0:entry.ns0:content:

ns0:entry.ns0:title: Orama-Interactive/Pixelorama
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/Orama-Interactive/Pixelorama
Language: gdscript
Unleash your creativity with Pixelorama, a powerful and accessible open-source pixel art multitool. Whether you want to create sprites, tiles, animations, or just express yourself in the language of pixel art, this software will realize your pixel-perfect dreams with a vast toolbox of features. Available on Windows, Linux, macOS and the Web!

Language: gdscript
